parameter.name: Application Path
parameter.description: Full site path where you would like to install your application (i.e., Default Web Site/orchard)

parameter.name: SetAclParameter1
parameter.description: Hidden - automatically sets write access for the app

parameter.name: SetAclParameter2
parameter.description: Hidden - automatically sets write access for the app

parameter.name: SetAclParameter3
parameter.description: Hidden - automatically sets write access for the app

parameter.name: Database Server
parameter.description: Location of your database server (i.e. server name, IP address, or server\instance)

parameter.name: Database Name
parameter.description: Name of the database for Orchard.

parameter.name: Database Username
parameter.description: User name to access you application database.

parameter.name: Database Administrator
parameter.description: Administrator user name for your database This is used to create the database and user if the don't already exist.

parameter.name: Database Administrator Password
parameter.description: Password for the database administrator account.

parameter.name: Admin Connection String SqlServer
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the connection request.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server};Initial Catalog={Database Name};User Id={Database Administrator};Password={Database Administrator Password}

parameter.name: Non-Admin Connection String SqlServer
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the connection request.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server};Initial Catalog={Database Name};User Id={Database Username};Password={Database Password}

parameter.name: Orchard Connection String
parameter.description: Orchard SQL Data Connection String Setting
